item.description:
Meet other people in the Manchester, New Hampshire, area interested in Buddhism! This is a book discussion group that encourages the exploration of Buddhist teachings representing different traditions, by a variety of contemporary authors, as well as the study of traditional Buddhist texts.

Everyone is invited. Sharing your personal experiences with Buddhism in your life is always welcome!

*The group generally meets on the second Monday of each month, at 7:00 p.m. in Manchester. Please check each meeting for the location.  Please RSVP via this website before attending a meeting (joining Meetup is easy and free).

Please always check the schedule to confirm meeting dates and times.

Weekly Meditation & Discussion Meeting

The Manchester Buddhism Sangha also holds a weekly Buddhist practice session that includes silent meditation, a dharma teaching (recorded or read), and a discussion. This meeting is suitable for beginners and experienced practioners alike. Please check the schedule for details. RSVPs are required to participate. 

 

The Sangha:

According tothe Uppadha Sutta, through the sangha we have "admirable friendship, admirable companionship and admirable camaraderie" to help us on the path. This is not easy to find!
